forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 29F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers mixed in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with some snow showers early. Steady rain or freezing rain developing in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and raw. Snow showers early in the period will change to rain or freezing rain by later in the day. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.
